comment: мы же договорились, что не нужнатакая барка. она потом удалится?

languages.text: Оружие, сундук драгоценностей и редкие ксеноартефакты все это время были здесь... Но раньше вы их не замечали.

traits.locale_text: Оружие, сундук драгоценностей и редкие ксеноартефакты все это время были здесь... Но раньше вы их не замечали.

languages.text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.
languages.original_text: Оружие, сундук драгоценностей и редкие ксеноартефакты все это время были здесь... Но раньше вы их не замечали.

traits.locale_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.
The weapons, the treasure chest and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But you have not noticed them before.
The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.
The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.
The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.

languages.text: 武器や宝箱、希少な異種族のアーティファクトは遥か前からここにあったものだが…なぜかこれまで気づかなかった。
languages.original_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.

traits.locale_text: 武器や宝箱、希少な異種族のアーティファクトは遥か前からここにあったものだが…なぜかこれまで気づかなかった。

languages.text: Las armas, el cofre y los xenoartefactos estaban aquí desde el primer momento... pero no los habías visto hasta ahora.
languages.original_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.

traits.locale_text: Las armas, el cofre y los xenoartefactos estaban aquí desde el primer momento... pero no los habías visto hasta ahora.

languages.text: 这些武器、宝箱和珍奇的异形造物已经堆在这里很久了……可不知为什么，你之前从来没有注意过它们。
languages.original_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.

traits.locale_text: 这些武器、宝箱和珍奇的异形造物已经堆在这里很久了……可不知为什么，你之前从来没有注意过它们。

languages.text: Les armes, le coffre au trésor et les xéno-artefacts rares se trouvaient ici depuis le début... mais pour une raison obscure, vous ne les aviez pas remarqués.
languages.original_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.

traits.locale_text: Les armes, le coffre au trésor et les xéno-artefacts rares se trouvaient ici depuis le début... mais pour une raison obscure, vous ne les aviez pas remarqués.

languages.text: Die Waffen, die Schatztruhe und die seltenen Xeno-Artefakte waren die ganze Zeit über hier ... Und doch sind sie dir noch nie aufgefallen.
languages.original_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.

traits.locale_text: Die Waffen, die Schatztruhe und die seltenen Xeno-Artefakte waren die ganze Zeit über hier ... Und doch sind sie dir noch nie aufgefallen.

languages.text: Bu silahlar, hazine sandığı ve nadir görülen zeno eserleri; en başından beri buradaymış... Ama nasıl olduysa hiç fark etmemişsin.
languages.original_text: The weapons, the treasure chest, and the rare xeno-artefacts were here the entire time... But somehow you had not noticed them before.
